Articles.Content:
Is there a mod by chance that enhances the stock ability to not only load parts of a craft but load the whole ship?

I would like to know if this is possible so I can mount a space plane on the back of a plane. Thank you.

Not that I know of. It seems a bit unnecessary since you can save a 'whole ship' as a subassembly if u begin the construction with a girder or similar part. Then u remove the ship (i.e. the actual ship) from that part to save it as a subassembly.

See this support thread started this morning.

Edited October 25, 2014 by The_Rocketeer
There's also SelectRoot, which allows you to change the root part of a craft within the VAB/SPH. You can then save it as a subassembly as you normally would.
